missions.title: Save the World from PX-41
missions.description: A secret laboratory in the Arctic Circle has just been stolen with a mysterious giant magnet. The lab contains the mutagen, PX-41, that can transform living things into evil, indestructible killing machines. We need to find and destroy it

villain.name: El Macho
villain.bio: A former renowned, nearly superhuman-level strong bank robber who now wants to dominate the world

item.name: PX-41
item.description: The PX-41 is a very dangerous mutator engineered in the top secret PX-Labs, located in the Arctic Circle. It is capable of turning any living things in the world into a purple, furry, indestructible, mindless, killing machine that is so dangerous that it can destroy anything in its path.

villain.name: El Macho
villain.bio: A former renowned, nearly superhuman-level strong bank robber who now wants to dominate the world

log.description: Felonius Gru defeated El Macho with the help of minions

It is capable of turning any living things in the world into a purple, furry, indestructible, mindless, killing machine that is so dangerous that it can destroy anything in its path.

missions.title: Prevent Balthazar Bratt to steal Dupont Diamond
missions.description: Balthazar Bratt wants to steal Dupond Diamond to build his evil giant robot. We need to stop him!

villain.name: Balthazar Bratt
villain.bio: A former child star in the 80's who, succeeding his show's cancellation after hitting puberty, plans on world domination.
